column1: # Assumed cost to access an unlimited supply for water.  Some water types may always
# be unlimted while others may be constrained depending on configuration.
# Note region/basin + water types not listed here are assumed to have a cost of DEFAULT_UNLIMITED_WATER_PRICE
# Note values in this table will be interpolated with gcam_interp rule=2
# See A_water_data.R for water types and which types may be constrained and the default price.
